privacy_policy_content:
1) Information We Collect

When you use GoGo, we may collect the following information:

- Account information: Name, email, phone number...
- Location data: To provide accurate location-based services.
- Usage data: Such as how you interact with the app.

2) How We Use the Information

We use the data to improve our service, provide support, and personalize your experience.

3) Protecting Information

We take proper measures to secure your data from unauthorized access.

4) Sharing Information

Some data may be shared with service providers only to enhance the experience.

5) Your Rights

You may request to update or delete your data at any time.

6) Cookies

We may use cookies to improve performance and user experience.

7) Changes to Policy

We may update this policy from time to time.

8) Your Consent

By using GoGo, you agree to this Privacy Policy.

9) Contact Us

Email: support@gogo.com
